org.grouplens.lenskit.iterative

Interface StoppingCondition

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ErrorThresholdStoppingCondition, IterationCountStoppingCondition, ThresholdStoppingCondition

    @DefaultImplementation(value=IterationCountStoppingCondition.class)
public interface StoppingCondition

    Stopping condition for iterative updates
